column5: I need to pick up 1 more casting reel, I have a Gander mountain Guide series IM8 7'6 heavy 1/2 - 1 /3/8oz. Primarily going to use for throwing Bucktails and 1.5oz spinner-baits, 1oz spoons. I need some suggestions.......trying to stay in the $100 and under slot. I will probably be using 40lb braid also.Thanks for any input...............Hips
Pflueger President 6925X or 6930X...good quality and fair price

For the price you have to spend you should watch the classifieds for a gentle used one that will get you more bang for the buck. I will say an inexpensive reel is one that will either aggravate you with poor performance or break in the worst time and manner.   Art
u can find a used curado e for that price. would work wiht the presentations you mentioned above.
Yup, for $100, you'll get way more bang for your buck with a used reel vs new.
Lebarons has the lexa 100's for just over $100. Cheers jeff
Spend a little extra money on a Curado. It's a proven performer and won't let you down.
Money well spent you'll love it I'm sure.
